snippet: The images of Kate Middleton sunbathing topless first appeared in the French magazine Closer, which is also owned by former Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s Mondadori group.
abstract: Italian magazine Chi owned by former Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi announces plans to publish photographs of the former Kate Middleton, the Duchess of Cambridge, sunbathing topless, just as its sister French magazine Closer did.

byline.contributor: Ravi Somaiya contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The images of Kate Middleton sunbathing topless first appeared in the French magazine Closer, which is also owned by former Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s Mondadori group.

headline.seo: Berlusconi’s Magazine Chi to Publish Topless Duchess Photos
headline.main: Berlusconi Magazine to Publish Duchess Photos
headline.print_headline: Berlusconi Magazine to Publish Duchess Photos
